delivery_faq: All products are shipped the same day if you order before 16. We deliver all our packages with Post Nord and you will receive an e-mail with a tracking number when your package has been dispatched. You can choose whether you want the package delivered to your home or which package box you may need. want it delivered to. In some cases, the item you order is in our remote warehouse. If this is the case, you must expect a delivery time of up to 3-5 days for the product.
